description: Originally named "Nagi", is a 13-year-old Japanese girl who wears a Kokuyo school uniform. Mukuro Rokudo uses her as a vessel after he saved her life by creating illusionary organs for her when she lost her right eye and some of her organs in an accident. Chrome has been shown using two of Mukuro`s six skills: creating illusions and summoning beasts that kill the enemy.
name: Chrome Dokuro
